website_summaries.verdict: This versatile utility knife cuts coroplast as well as a variety of other media, too.
pros: Utility knife cuts coroplast, ceiling tile, corrugate, gator board and foam board
Handle made of high-impact ABS with built-in staple remover
Ratchet-wheel blade lock allows variety of blade positioning
cons: The cutting guide is not terribly useful
Some found the blades were not sharp enough to cut certain materials

customer_reviews.title: Best razor.knife
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the knife for installing drop ceiling bought the expensive black steel blades to go with it they last long and make the job of installing drop ceiling to much faster and look a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut EVA foam for some cosplay projects that I was doing. It's not nearly sharp enough to cut cleanly through the stuff without making severely ragged edges. I'm sure it works just fine as a box cutter though. If you plan to use it in the same capcity as me, might I recommend instead something with a titatnium blade like a Kobalt (what I use now). These also have double sided (trapezoid) blades that are relatively cheap to replace and have many other blade shapes to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great,
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, not sure how helpful the guide is however. It has a .25 inch offset. It is very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Burke

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how you can lock the blade at different depths of cutting, and the blade won't slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar 38

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for cutting ceiling tiles. It made a tedious job a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amaganian

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for me especially when working on roofs
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for me especially when working on roofs. Good grip. When these go definitely will get another pair for work
customer_reviews.author: Jose contracter

customer_reviews.title: A Workable Solution
customer_reviews.text: Even with a brand-new blade, the ceiling tiles can still crumble at the corners - needs the right technique. Slow down and use a sawing-action to get smooth corners. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Krpan

customer_reviews.title: It cuts like they said it would.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for cutting and edging 2x4 layin ceiling tiles.
customer_reviews.author: BERNARD J. QUINLAN

customer_reviews.title: Liked it enough to buy a second
customer_reviews.text: The most used tool in my shop. Liked it enough to buy a second. Dad's been using them for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent well built tool that feels good in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Downing

customer_reviews.title: REALLY DURABLE KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this knife. Very strong built and durable. Hobbyists, sign makers, ...this is a really great product to consider.
customer_reviews.author: bvns

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and built in replacement blades are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A step up from the traditional box cutter, with a simple snap-off mechanism to reveal a new and VERY sharp replacement blade. I use it for crafting, my husband has one in the shop. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: DYK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best knife ever. Had my original one for 20 years, bought this to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: badams

product_meta.title: OLFA 9021US CL 18mm Heavy-Duty Utility Knife with 90 degree Cutting Base
product_meta.description: This versatile, heavy-duty utility knife is one the most versatile cutters made by OLFA and a classic example of value-added features often found in OLFA cutters. Unique cutting guide delivers accurate trimming for drop ceiling tiles, and sturdy cutting base allows for a perfect 90º cutting edge. Cutting guide and built-in staple remover also offer efficiency and accuracy in corrugate box top cutting. Also includes a heavy-duty stainless steel blade channel that holds blade tight.
feature_bullets: Cuts Coroplast, ceiling tile, corrugate, foam board, gator board
High-impact ABS handle with built-in staple remover
Ratchet-wheel blade lock for unlimited blade positioning
Includes one OLFA 18mm carbon tool steel snap-off blade

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
